title: Did Ulysses S. Grant expect this about the upcoming civil war?
subtitle: "Let's start guarding against every enemy that threatens the continuation of free republican institutions," advised President Grant.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: U.S. President Ulises S. Grant predicted that the next civil war would be between patriotism and intelligence on the one hand and superstition, ambition and ignorance on the other.
